svt_axi_port_monitor_transaction_report_callback Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for class svt_axi_port_monitor_transaction_report_callback:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

This callback class is used to generate AXI Transaction summary information relative to the svt_axi_port_monitor component. Transactions are reported on as they occur, for inclusion in the log.

Member Function Documentation

  function void
 svt_axi_port_monitor_transaction_report_callback::clear_summary
 (   ) 

Clear the currently stored summaries.

  function void
 svt_axi_port_monitor_transaction_report_callback::new
 (  svt_sequence_item_report sys_xact_report , bit enable_log_report , bit enable_file_report , bit enable_local_summaries = 1, string name = "svt_axi_port_monitor_transaction_report_callback"  ) 

Creates a new instance of this class, with a reference to the AXI Transaction report.

sys_xact_report - Transaction report we are contributing to.

enable_log_report - Indicates whether reporting to a log should be enabled.

enable_file_report - Indicates whether reporting to a file should be enabled.

enable_local_summaries - Indicates whether the callbacks should create localized summaries.

name - Instance name.

  function string
 svt_axi_port_monitor_transaction_report_callback::psdisplay_summary
 (   ) 

Return the current report in a string for use by the caller.

Utility which produces trace short display and verbose full display of AXI Transaction.
